TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessibilityService/MagnificationController extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Used to control and query the state of display magnification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CenterX As Single
public: property float CenterX { float get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the unscaled screen-relative X coordinate of the focal center of the magnified region.
Docs.value: the unscaled screen-relative X coordinate of the center of the magnified region

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentMagnificationRegion As Region
public: property Android::Graphics::Region ^ CurrentMagnificationRegion { Android::Graphics::Region ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the region of the screen currently active for magnification if the controlling magnification is MagnificationConfig#MAGNIFICATION_MODE_FULLSCREEN.
Docs.value: the magnification region of the currently controlling magnification

Docs.summary: Gets the MagnificationConfig of the controlling magnifier on the display.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MagnificationRegion As Region
public: property Android::Graphics::Region ^ MagnificationRegion { Android::Graphics::Region ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the region of the screen currently active for magnification.
Docs.value: the region of the screen currently active for magnification, or an empty region if magnification is not active.
